mapper.select: select skill_code, skill_name, skill_enabled from skill
SELECT POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_ENABLED FROM POSITION

select info.member_id, info.member_nickname, nvl(info.position_name,'-') as position_name, nvl(info.skill_name,'-') as skill_name, info.enabled, nvl(count.count,0) as count from V_M_INFO info left join V_FINISH_COUNT count on info.member_id = count.member_id where info.member_id != 0
and info.member_nickname like '%${nickname}%'
order by info.member_id
select count(*) as mcount from member where member_id != 0 and member_email !='null' and enabled =1
select count(*) as pcount from project

select sk.skill_code as id ,sk.skill_name as name, count(decode(psk.project_id,(null),null,1)) as count from skill sk left join p_skill psk on sk.skill_code = psk.skill_code group by sk.skill_code,sk.skill_name order by count desc

select pos.position_id as id, pos.position_name as name, count(decode(pm.project_id,null,null,1)) as count from position pos left join p_member pm on pos.position_id = pm.position_id group by pos.position_id, pos.position_name order by count desc

select pf.field_code as id, pf.field_name as name, count(decode(p.project_id, null, null ,1)) as count from p_field pf left join project p on p.field_code = pf.field_code group by pf.field_code, pf.field_name order by count desc

select sk.skill_code as id,sk.skill_name as name, count(decode(msk.member_id,(null),null,1)) as count from skill sk left join m_skill msk on sk.skill_code = msk.skill_code group by sk.skill_code,sk.skill_name order by count desc

select pos.position_id as id, pos.position_name as name, count(decode(md.member_id,null,null,1)) as count from position pos left join m_detail md on pos.position_id = md.position_id group by pos.position_id, pos.position_name order by count desc
select p_state,count(*) as count from p_detail group by p_state

choose.when:
insert into SKILL (SKILL_CODE,SKILL_NAME, SKILL_ENABLED) select 'SK'||sk_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.skill_name} as skill_name, #{list.skill_enabled} as skill_enabled from dual ) A

insert into p_field (field_CODE,field_NAME, field_ENABLED) select 'PF'||pf_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.field_name} as field_name, #{list.field_enabled} as field_enabled from dual ) A

insert into position (position_id,position_NAME, position_ENABLED) select 'POS'||pos_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.position_name} as position_name, #{list.position_enabled} as position_enabled from dual ) A
